name: Steven Coleman
description: I’m a man who values family, honesty and loyalty. I want to find somebody to share the next chapter of my life with together. I’m looking for a friend to share the journey. To travel, to snuggle, to go to the cabin. Go on long walks, go out for coffee or have a glass of wine. Dream about the future. While I have a successful professional career my life is empty with out love and family. I’m looking for my best friend, my partner and my lover. I want the love of a great woman and the sharing of family and life together. I want to find my soul mate – I’m a hopeless romantic.
